1.0.name: wordpress/the-random-hadith-widget
1.0.description: A widget that displays a random hadith. It takes hadiths from Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim and more. It also gives a link at the end of the hadith to iknowledge.islamicnature.com where you can read more hadiths. Tags: koran, quran, muslim, islam, plugin, hadith, widget.
